reviews.review: geri almak istiyom paramı

Un plaisir, vraiment. Déjà que le jeu avait des problèmes techniques, mais depuis leur dernière MAJ c'est encore plus incroyable !!! La hitbox  est broken. Les tueurs vous touchent avec 1m de vide entre leur arme et vous. EXEMPLE : les tueurs peuvent désormais vous mettre à terre alors que vous êtes séparés par un mur et une certaine distance :D 
Les palettes, qui avaient déjà leurs défauts, maintenant c'est pire. Les tueurs se font téléporter de l'autre côté quand vous l'abaissez. De ce fait ils peuvent vous toucher :)

Bref, si quelqu'un veut développer un concurrent direct a DBD, je pense que ça ne sera pas difficile. Il y'a plein d'autres problèmes mais je n'ai pas le temps de tout énumérer. Ce jeu est de pire en pire au fil du temps. Un réel plaisir !

ui 어느정도 개선은 했지만 다쳤을때 뛰는 모션 정말 말도 안됩니다. 5인격은 순한 데바데라 그러려니 하는데 이걸 왜 5인격 수준으로 만드는거죠? 5인격 다쳤을때 그런식으로 뛰어다니는거 예전에 얼핏 봤는데 데바데 생존자 모션을 왜 이렇게 찐따로 만들어버리는겁니까 부드럽게 다듬지만 말고 예전으로 롤백 해주세요 잘하는분들 살인마 피하는 영상만 모아놓은거 엄청 멋있었는데 이런 찐따 모션으로는 이제 어림도 없습니다

Я рот ебал разраба и игроков в дбд.Вы сукины дети выпускаете обнову для манов и всё ровно ты кусок за мана ты 0.В эту игру можно играть если тебе 12 лет и у вас мать сдохла.
Тебя генрашат за любого мана ты бегай давай хиты.За тебя рандомы приседают,ливают,получают хиты=-капля.Против тебя пати/рандомы которые играет в эту игру по 2 к часов.Тебя стопят,глушат как карася ебаного ты смотри как убегают  в ворота.Мой вердикт не закидуйте бабло в эту помойку я как человек который скупил всех манов это говорю.А если играете то играйте в свою игру.На этом я всё

Fun game

I have been playing this game almost sense it came out, 
this game was heading into a very great direction a few weeks ago. 
Then they came out with a update that literally destroyed the core mechanics of this game.
They changed the rawness of this game, changed the movement and the feel of it. 
Changed the UI, including the hit boxes as well as animations. 
In my opinion if its not broken dont fix it, all this game needed was a few tweaks.
It literally would be one of the best horror games that was ever created.
 Until the the Devs decided to destroy what was originally created. 
It doesnt feel like the same game and people are mad, people are absolutely pissed and outraged at this company.
People  have spent thousands of dollars and countless amounts of money only to have their favorite game destroyed,
with a single update. 
If you are looking to purchase this game, I will say wait to see how things turn out before you purchase.
This was my favorite game and now I have nothing to play anymore I stopped playing this game because the rawness and the original feel was all taken away with a single update. 
If they dont revert back to the last patch quickly this game will die, as the same thing happen to H1z1 when the entire community turned their backs on the company after taking the originality out of their game and changing the core mechanics. 
If you have ever seen the rise and fall of a video game, you should know to never change what was started and to never up root a system without the support of new growth. 
Change is good only when necessary.
If you dont listen to the the embodiment of the people who support ur company you will never succeed. 
If this company dosent open their eyes and see they are loosing so many people that were truly committed for the long haul then they are in for a rude awakening. 
As long as they are able to revert to the last patch with no changes and then add the tweaks that were necessary this game will be able to bounce back. If that does not take place and take place very soon, you will see what you have been working on for years come to a halt.
Dont try to fix what you have already destroyed because thats exactly what the creators of H1z1 tried to do which turned into the game slowly dying in what seemed overnight. 
You need a revert and a revert badly.  
Other companies have done this and shortly after every single company's game unfortunately died out. 
Listen to the people who have been here since the start, if they are telling you this update is very bad and their favorite game has been lost. You should know you have truly messed up. 
Well thats my review so far, if this game can go back to what it was and then tweaked it will be ranked back on my list as a 5/5 star game.

Na minus jest trudność gry, gdyż nowi gracze muszą poznać jeszcze wiele przed sobą (tacy jak ja)
Grafika sama w sobie jest bardzo dobra, klimat jest niezły a o loopingu nawet nie wspomnę.
Za 70 złotych posiadasz grę która dostarcza ci wiele godzin szczęścia, zakłopotania, mroczności oraz strachu.

Pociągnąłem za uchwyt rozrusznika, a stara piła spalinowa wydała charakterystyczny dźwięk. Nie musiałem tego robić, bo uciekający gracz doskonale wiedział o mojej obecności. Czuł mój krok na plecach. Z jakiegoś sadystycznego powodu chciałem jednak, żeby bał się jeszcze bardziej. Żeby zrobiło mu się słabo. Był zwierzyną, a ja byłem łowcą. Cholera, Dead by Daylight naprawdę wyzwala w człowieku demony.

I started playing this game around 2017-2018, The Pig DLC was the first that was added since I had started playing. I managed to sink a fairly good 550 hours in. Found myself in a great group of friends, we always ended up playing together. But I always seemed to be the most passionate about the games future. Despite me having played the game the least at the time. After getting bored and wanting to take a break from the game. I continued to watch the dev diary's in hope that the game would get somewhere refreshing. It is now 2021 and some of the most exciting things that were talked about at the time have been washed away by the devs decision to push out:

-Mediocre at best DLC's

-Forms of funnelling in money from the player base (This started with the addition of Auric Cells)

-And now a crappy unnecessary HUD rework

I remember when we were promised game modes, and changes to perks that would truly make the game refreshing. Some of the more critical ones only happening NOW (Such as DS). 

Dead By Daylight is now another prime example of developers that put money before their community which is becoming this games down fall.

The last update has added the biggest pile of human feces I've ever witnessed. As if hitboxes weren't nonsense enough before, they've now become a crime against humanity. And if you are willing enough to ignore this atrocity, these hitboxes attract the worst kind of killer players to the game, abusing anything legal to just make you hate ever last second of the game.  
Loved the game before, besides its imperfections, but now I'd rather take a bullet to the head instead. 
See you in the game tomorrow...

UI나 히트박스는 어느정도 수정이 되었는데 준구 전기톱 돌진할때 타이밍 잘맞추면 판자로 기절만 시킬수 있었던게 한번씩 기절시키면서 같이 맞게 됨. 개병신같은 판정으로 전기톱 체인이 찢어지면서 내 캐릭 모가지를 긁은건지 판자라인을 넘어오지도 않았으면서 한방에 죽이는 미띤 판정.
에라이 시부랄 쓰면서도 열받네. 그리고 창틀을 몸이 완전히 넘었는데도 칼이 길어지는건지 맞을때가 있음. 그게 ㅈ같아서 회복력이랑 고양이들어도 쳐맞음. 뭔 기준인지 모르겠어 똑같은 루트타도 때리는애가 있고 못떄리는 애가 있고

This game.... My god this game. I cannot in good conscience recommend this game to anyone of sound mind and spirit. It is not fun, but it will Stockholm Syndrome you into loving every second of the torture. It's like a heroin addiction with none of the benefits. I beg you, if you are looking to play this game DO NOT DO IT. You will either not like it, or love it, and the latter is oh so much worse. I've 100%ed this game and I'm all the worse for it, I haven't had social interaction in so long, i long for the touch of another human being, but even still, I feel the pull to shut myself inside, and binge the game for 12 hours.
挺好的游戏，风格迥异的屠夫，气氛诡异的场景，恐怖游戏中在Twitch的受众人数一直在前五，可惜在中国被禁播是其不能再国内发展的直接原因。对了，非常坑的一点是，匹配机制完全不考虑玩家的实力段位差距，新手屠夫经常会碰到段位很高的人类开黑，这对屠夫和人类来说，都没什么体验，尤其是对屠夫玩家的游戏体验是毁灭性的打击。
Trotz der vielen Bugs die es gibt macht es viel Spaß :D Hab ja nicht umsonst 800 Stunden. Besser ist es natürlich mit Freunden!

Came from xbox in January and still having a blast with this. The variety of killers, the gore, the moments of jump scares, outplays and terror for those new to the game has had me playing for years... loving these graphic updates, not such a big fan of the survivor locomotive tweaks but I'll manage. Only complaint I would have at this point upset that I have to pay for all the DLC characters since I had them all on xbox :.( I still recommend this game to my friends when they want a new game to play.
